message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $85 for it.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95. If you're not willing to go lower, I'll have to go with John's offer.
